description: 1850 time-slice simulation with 1850 SSTs, 1850 WMGHG concentrations and 2014 NTCF emissions.
keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 1, piControl perturbation, 1850 WMGHG, 1850 SST, 2014 NTCF, Near Term Climate Forcers,
long_name: pre-industrial climatolgical SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 NTCF emissions
rationale: To compute the ERF for 1850 and 2014

requirements.description: Idealised temporal constraint, repeating 1850 for 30 years
requirements.label: 1850-1851 30yrs

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial sea surface temperature from the piControl experiment

requirements.label: PIControlSST

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial sea ice concentration from the piControl experiment.
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial control, SIC, sea ice, sea ice concentration
requirements.label: PIControlSIC

requirements.description: Impose repeating 1850 Well Mixed Green House Gas (WMGHG) concentrations.
requirements.label: 1850WMGHG

requirements.description: Impose repeating 2014 Near Term Climate Forcers (NTCF) emissions.

requirements.description: Use and Atmosphere model with chemistry
requirements.label: AGCM-Chem Configuration
